data.message: https://soundcloud.com/mc_np/mcnp-lights-out      I can see you are all real rap fans,I'm 17 years old I don't go to school and I live in a caravan I need to blow up I have nothing to fall back on.this is my first rap I recorded and I'm making an ep this year,if you listin to it I would appriciate it more then u would imagine! mad love and respect to everyone that views it,and to everyone that doesn't cos I'm not a hater! please check it out so u can see I HAVE WHAT IT TAKES! just click on the link:)
